title: Events/Missions Are a Joke Unless You Pay Money.
body:
Complete 30 missions and get jack shit. Buy an 'event pass' and get 5 times as much.

What a fucking joke, RIP rewards and Hextech crafting.

Oh, I'm sitting at 10 points in the current event, I'm just not playing because this is a load of bullshit.

replies.body: Well, they make money off the cosmetics. So, why would they let you get all the cosmetic stuff for free? The free stuff you can get is maybe some extra skin shards or a chest or whatever. It makes perfect sense not to give you access to all their money-making content just because you think playing the game should give it to you.

> [{quoted}](name=Astara,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xZkHeaEE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-12-21T02:15:06.979+0000)
>
> Well, they make money off the cosmetics. So, why would they let you get all the cosmetic stuff for free? The free stuff you can get is maybe some extra skin shards or a chest or whatever. It makes perfect sense not to give you access to all their money-making content just because you think playing the game should give it to you.

Okay, that is totally what I was talking about /whoosh the 747 over your head.

Nothing went over my head. You're mad because they won't give you MORE free stuff on TOP of a free game. You're literally just acting like a child throwing a fit because other people are willing/able to spend money on this game that you are not, therefore they get MORE things. How is that in ANY way unfair??

I let all my points from the Worlds event expire without being spent, I won't even play to earn during this trash.
Do you not see what you are doing?

You are becoming like all the fremium trash that plagued the net 5 years ago...
